channel.title: proxy client running on VM2
channel.description:
I have a proxy client running on VM2 which has Internal Network and Bridge adapter, I'v been easy to have VM3 access the proxy client on VM2 through the Internal Network, but when I want do the same to Whonix-Gateway, it could'nt.
Can I have way to connect Whonix Gateway to the proxy client?

item.title: proxy client running on VM2
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
whonix.org – 22 Mar 20

Combining Tunnels with Tor - Whonix

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

Read full topic
